title: Women in Shanghai
overview: A story revolving around a woman who chooses to stay in Shanghai after graduating from college. She encounters many men in her life but doesn't stray from her aim to become part of the upper 10% of the city's population.Â Luo Hai Yan is a university student from a small town who strives to carve out a career for herself in Shanghai. When Zhang Tian Hao, Chen Xiao Wei, and Yan Bing come into the picture, they make an impact in her life.
